content: I'm wondering if there is a CAM equivalent of pop_tools? Basically, I want the grid information to get info such as areacell and levels. In the case there isn't, what files are best for extracting this information from CAM? History files? I am using both 2deg CAM runs, and CAM-SE runs that I have to remap. Thanks
